input-field.name: categoryFilterMode
input-field.label: Category Filter Mode
input-field.helpText: Leaf Nodes will only show the leaf nodes of the matching product's categories. Nested Links will show the current category, and its ancestors and immediate children.

input-field.name: restrictPropertiesOnListing
input-field.label: Restrict Properties on Listing
input-field.helpText: If enabled, only properties that are in the current listing will be shown.

input-field.name: passwordStrength
input-field.label: Minimum Password Strength
input-field.helpText: We recommend at least medium. More information available at https://symfony.com/doc/current/reference/constraints/PasswordStrength.html

input-field.name: passwordRegex
input-field.label: Password Regex
input-field.helpText: If you selected "Regex" for password validation, enter it here. If you leave it blank, the default regex will be used of 1 uppercase, 1 lowercase, 1 number, 1 special character, and 8 character min length.

input-field.name: restrictAdminByIP
input-field.label: Restrict Admin by IP
input-field.helpText: Enabling this will block admin access other than for the IPs you list below. Be certain to add your own IP!

input-field.name: restrictAdminIPList
input-field.label: Permitted IP Addresses
input-field.helpText: Add one IP address per line

input-field.name: quickAddAutocompleteEnabled
input-field.label: Enable Quick Add Autocomplete
input-field.helpText: The quick add on the cart page will autocomplete with part numbers matching the user's search.

input-field.name: quickAddStackableEnabled
input-field.label: Quick Add Autocomplete Stackable
input-field.helpText: When products are added to the cart via the autocomplete, their quantities will stack with other identical product numbers already in the cart.

input-field.name: quickAddAdvancedSearchEnabled
input-field.label: Enable Quick Add Advanced Search
input-field.helpText: If enabled, the quick add will use the advanced search instead of just a product number search.
